summary: This is an email from an out-of-office auto-reply regarding Jeffrey Epstein's suicide watch and psych observation status at the Metropolitan Correctional Center, sent on July 23, 2019, just weeks before his death.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Identified as inmate #76318-054 at the Metropolitan Correctional Center, with his suicide watch and psych observation status being updated.

events.title: Suicide Watch/Psych Observation Update
events.description: An email update regarding inmate Jeffrey Epstein's status, indicating he was on suicide watch but with no psych observation.

keyFacts: The email is dated July 23, 2019, which is just weeks before Jeffrey Epstein's death on August 10, 2019.
Jeffrey Epstein is identified as inmate #76318-054 at the Metropolitan Correctional Center.
The email indicates Epstein was on suicide watch but with no psych observation at the time.
The sender was out of the office from late July through early August 2019, coinciding with the period of Epstein's death.
